pull.title: doc: make `-DWITH_ZMQ=ON` explicit on `build-unix.md`
pull.body: ZMQ support is not built by default on Linux, and the docs don't make that clear. This PR makes it explicit that the `-DWITH_ZMQ=ON` flag is required to build with ZMQ support on `build-unix.md`.
